nodes.text: Bruno Denturri was a being who was an enemy of the Zygerrian Queen Miraj Scintel.

Bruno Denturri was a being that became an enemy of the Zygerrian Queen Miraj Scintel. Following a battle on Kiros during the Clone Wars, Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker, along with his Padawan Ahsoka Tano, investigated the planet Zygerria after the sudden disappearance of a whole colony on Kiros. In order to get close to the Queen, Skywalker went under the name Lars Quell and claimed he had killed Denturri and procured a slave from him.
